channel.title: 667/*** need some ideas :P (any1 please?)
channel.description:
right ive made a prestige system on my server where if your maxed cb you may prestige and go bak down cmb lvl 3, and 10th prestige is the max, atm i have added a veteran badge to players name in chatbox when they reach 10th prestige (max prestige) and recieve a veteran cape; but i want to make prestiging more intresting so i need some tips and ideas to help me develop a great prestige system so please if anyone could give me some nice ideas
[b]THANK YOU.[/b]
anyone?? please?
